attributes.action: We demand that Parliament is dissolved and a new General Election is called.
attributes.additional_details:
Conservative Leadership Election has allowed someone to lead the Country who is:
•	not supported by the general public and who is 
•	committed to a course that is dangerous for the country’s future.
attributes.background:
In this time of crisis for the country, a new government should be elected by the public as a whole, not less than 200,000 members of the Conservative Party. 

Our country’s future should not be dependent on the constitution of a political party.
